title: ContentWriter
author: ContentWriter
content: I never knew the real money was in altcoins and shitcoins. Bitcoin is simply for rich investors. If you're just starting out in cryptocurrency investing, it's best to ignore Bitcoin and the hype it receives on this forum. The secret to making any money from crypto is NOT bitcoin. Research, test, and see for yourself.

comments.body: No one forced you to invest in Bitcoin; there are other things that you can invest in, and it's left for you to choose what you consider best for yourself. Go study more, you need it. Altcoins are more volatile, as is the risk, so when the market is green, you will make a significant profit, but when the market crashes, so will your money. comments.author: kryptqnick
comments.body: If someone invests in Bitcoin, expecting a 20x or even a 5x short-term profit, that's just unrealistic expectations, which is obvious if one takes time to see how much (in percentage) Bitcoin has grown between ATHs the last couple of times. Maybe there are altcoins that can bring someone those profits, but there is an ocean of altcoins, so it is not easy to navigate it to find the right coin. And also, crucially, find the right time both to buy and to sell. If someone wants to experiment and take that risk, they are welcome to try. But Bitcoin is a safer option, if one is ready for a long-term commitment and expects mild profit.

comments.author: Blitzboy
comments.body: Folks, it seems that this is a frustrated investor here. When things do not go your way, it is simple to criticize. Not the issue is Bitcoin. Actually, Bitcoin has shown its value again and time yet again. It's a groundbreaking technology, a store of value, and an inflation-hedge. I know you're drawn to altcoin because of its promise for fast wealth. Those are dangerous, loaded with pump-and-dump scheme and scam.The real issue here is not Bitcoin, it's your approach. It's about knowing the principles, doing your homework, and seeing long term. Those that make sensible Bitcoin investments are realizing actual gains. I thus advise you to stand back and educate yourself before discounting Bitcoin. Discover blockchain technology, grasp market patterns, and create a sensible investing plan. Recall in the realm of investing that knowledge is power. And knowing the correct information will help you to make Bitcoin a useful addition to your portfolio.
